metadata.title: TASK 1: About my knee replacement
metadata.description: Eight quick questions. Tip: You will need the month and year of your knee replacement surgery

metadata.title: TASK 2: About You
metadata.description: Four quick questions. Tip: You will need your NHS number

metadata.title: TASK 3: Connect my devices
metadata.description: Connect one or more devices Tip (for Fitbit & Oura ring): You will need login details for your device Tip (for Apple): You need to enter the study name PAPrKA; use the email and password from your PAPrKA account; best completed using WiFi

options.title: TASK 3: Connect my device(s)
options.description:
Click on the connect button for your device.

The study team will collect past physical activity data, if available, from 1st July 2016 until 31st December 2024. This will be a one-off transfer of data. We will not collect any activity data beyond the 31st December 2024.

devices.title: Fitbit Tab
devices.description: Before clicking Connect, you can read [step-by-step instructions](/study/paprka/resources/guides/PAPrKA_Study_Guide_Fitbit.pdf) or [watch a video](https://youtu.be/nPRRGlkdrvg) to see how to share your Fitbit physical activity data.

devices.title: Oura Ring Tab
devices.description: Before clicking Connect, you can read [step-by-step instructions](/study/paprka/resources/guides/PAPrKA_Study_Guide_Oura.pdf) or [watch a video](https://youtu.be/m_4rbNYphXs) to see how to share your Oura Ring physical activity data.

devices.title: Apple Health
devices.description: Before clicking Connect, you can [step-by-step instructions](/study/paprka/resources/guides/PAPrKA_Study_Guide_iPhone.docx) or [watch a video](#) to see how to share your iPhone or Apple Watch physical activity data.

metadata.title: TASK 4: Give us your feedback
metadata.description: Seven quick questions about joining the study

eligibility.title: Check you can take part
eligibility.description:
_You can join the study if you answer Yes to all **four questions**. Please scroll down to complete all four questions._
_If your answer is No to any of the questions, and you want to leave the page, click the exit button on your left._

items.description: Have you had knee replacement (total, or partial), either through the NHS or a private healthcare provider, between 1<sup>st</sup> January 2017 and 31<sup>st</sup> December 2023?
Were you over 18 years of age at the time of your knee replacement?

Did you use a Fitbit, iPhone (6s and above)_*, Apple Watch_* or Oura Ring to track your activity six months or more before your knee replacement?
_*If you used an iPhone, it automatically collects physical activity data so please select YES._

Did you use a Fitbit, iPhone (6s and above)_*, Apple Watch_* or Oura Ring to track your activity one year or more after your knee replacement?
_*If you used an iPhone, it automatically collects physical activity data so please select YES._

consent.title: Consent
consent.description:
Before you can take part in this study, we need your consent. Please read carefully the consent statements and click Yes or No for each statement. You will need to scroll down to sign the consent form.
You need to answer YES to the first nine items to take part in the study. The remaining items are optional, and you can take part if you answer YES or NO.

requiredItems.description: I confirm that I have read the [Participant Information Sheet (PIS) (Version 6.0, Date xx/10/25)](/study/paprka/resources/paprka_pis.pdf) for the above study and have had the opportunity to consider the information and ask questions and had these answered satisfactorily.

I understand that my participation in the study is voluntary and that I am free to withdraw at any time without giving a reason and without detriment to myself.
I understand that it will not be possible to remove my data from the project dataset once the key that links my name and contact information with my participant ID has been broken.
I agree to take part on this basis.

I understand my involvement in this study involves:
- Setting up a study account on the PAPrKA website.
- Completing up to 4 tasks in the PAPrKA Website.

I give permission for the study team to collect my physical activity data stored within Fitbit, Oura Ring, and / or Apple Health between 01st July 2016 and 31st December 2024.
I acknowledge that if I have connected my iPhone, Apple Watch, Fitbit or Oura ring to other fitness tracking devices and or apps, physical activity information from those other devices/ apps will also be collected and used by the research team.

I understand that creating the joined research dataset will involve: 1. The PAPrKA team sending my name, date of birth, NHS number, sex and postcode to the National Joint Registry (NJR). 2. The NJR looking to see if I am in the Registry. If I am in the Registry, they will add a copy of my knee replacement information in their secure portal for the PAPrKA study team to access. 3. The PAPrKA study team joining my physical activity (for 6 months before and 1 year after my knee replacement) and survey information to my knee replacement information in the NJR secure portal.
I give permission for my information to be shared, accessed, and joined.

I give permission for the PAPrKA team to: 
1. Access my knee replacement information from the NJR (page 10 in PIS)
2. Access my information from NHS England held at NJR (page 11 in PIS)
3. Work with NJR researchers to analyse the joined research dataset.
I agree that any data collected may be included in anonymous form in **publications, academic theses, dissertations, or conference presentations.**

I understand that data collected during the study may be looked at by individuals from the University of Manchester or regulatory authorities, where it is relevant to my taking part in this research. I give permission for these individuals to have access to my data.
I agree to take part in this study.

optionalItems.description:
I agree my information (i.e. physical activity data for 01st July 2016–31st Dec 2024, survey data and demographic data) held at University of Manchester can beshared for both research and educational purposes.
I agree on the basis that only de-identified data will be shared and where there are data protection measures in place to ensure the confidentiality of the data.

I would like to take part in the prize draw
I understand that my full name and email address will be passed to the University of Manchester’s Finance team for the sole purpose of sending me the Love to Shop voucher, If I agree to take part in the prize draw and win.
I agree that the researchers may contact me in future about other research projects.
I agree that the researchers may retain my contact details in order to provide me with a summary of the findings for this study.

I agree that the researchers may send me the quarterly newsletter.
I understand this means I will be added to the PAPrKA mailing list.

consent.signatureDescription:
Please draw or type your signature in the box below and press the Save button.
Please note, drawing or typing your signature is the same as signing a paper form with a pen.
Please check your responses carefully before you submit.

account.title: Register account
account.description:
**You need an account to join the PAPrKA study.** Set up your account by providing an email address and creating a password which must be 12 characters long. You will need this password if you plan to provide iPhone or Apple watch information. You may wish to write it down.
Once you provide both your email address and password, you will need to verify your account by opening an email we will send to you and entering the code.
Once your account is verified, we will send you a copy of your consent form and the study’s information sheet. If you cannot find the email, please check you junk/spam folder.

studyInformation.title: Study Information
studyInformation.content: We understand that you may have questions about our research, what your involvement would be and much more. Please read carefully the Participant Information Sheet to find answers to these questions. If you have any questions about what you have read, please feel free to contact the team on and 0161 306 2719. Please feel free to talk to a family member or friend about taking part in this study before you go on to sign the consent form.

items.field_label:
Thank you for consenting. Now set up your PAPrKA study account.
_Please note, if you do not set up your study account, the study team cannot get in touch with you._

portal.title: What You Need to Complete PAPrKA Study Tasks
portal.content:
To take part you will need to complete Tasks 1, 2 and 3. Task 4 ‘Give us your feedback’ is optional.

Please note, when you start a task, you must answer all the questions in one go and press "submit" or you will lose your answers

finishContent.title: Thank you for completing the PAPrKA study tasks.
finishContent.content:
Thank you for taking part in our study. Thanks to your contribution, and through our research, we can support patients and doctors to make better informed decisions about knee replacement surgery in the future. Now that you have submitted the study tasks, you will be able to view (but not change) your responses by logging back into your study account.
If you haven’t already completed task 4, and can spare a few minutes, please consider completing it to give us your feedback
